explains: adj. 畅销的，抢手的；畅销书的

sentences.en: "Monopoly" is one of the best-selling games of all time.
sentences.cn: “大富翁”是有史以来最畅销的游戏之一。

sentences.en: Haruki Murakami is Japan's best-selling author.
sentences.cn: 村上春树是日本的畅销书作家。

sentences.en: Further successes came hot on the heels of her first best-selling novel.
sentences.cn: 她的第一部畅销小说之后是接二连三的成功。
